title: Doctor Unruly - Novel Updates
tags: Black Belly   Doctors   Handsome Male Lead   Misunderstandings   Modern Day
author: Miao Yi You Xiu   苗亦有秀
description:
Doctor Shi is a neurologist, his surgery skills are more accurate than a master chef using a knife to cut a melon. He is thirty-one years old and also the youngest director of neurology aka black belly boss.

Unfortunately for Na Na who is a young nurse, she intentionally crosses path with the black belly Doctor Shi because she needs his legendary hands to perform a risky brain surgery on someone close to her heart… but unknown to Doctor Shi and Na Na, cupid’s shooting skills are stronger than their steely hearts.>
